bill.title: Bonds; authorize the issuance of general obligation bonds for various programs administered by MDA.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $5,000,000.00 For The Ace Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $4,000,000.00 For The Mississippi Job Protection Act Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $2,000,000.00 For The Mississippi Rural Impact Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $5,000,000.00 For The Mississippi Existing Industry Productivity Loan Fund; To Amend Section 57-61-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase From $331,500,000.00 To $346,500,000.00 The Amount Of General Obligation Bonds That May Be Issued Under The Mississippi Business Investment Act; To Amend Section 57-61-36, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase From $40,100,000.00 To $55,100,000.00 The Amount Of Bond Proceeds That The Mississippi Development Authority May Utilize Under The Mississippi Business Investment Act To Make Loans Or Grants To Counties And Municipalities Through An Equipment And Public Facilities Grant And Loan Fund To Aid In Infrastructure-related Improvements, The Purchase Of Equipment And In The Purchase, Construction Or Repair And Renovation Of Public Facilities; To Amend Section 65-4-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $40,000,000.00 The Amount Of General Obligation Bonds Authorized To Be Issued Under The Economic Development Highway Act; And For Related Purposes.
